column3:
Seems OK, but I'd have to glance at CreateTransaction() callee's, to make 100% certain there are no side effects.

The only other question I have is whether or not there is a driving need?  (yes, I did review the thread)
I prefer an option to create transactions without committing them, allowing to inspect them, and then decide to commit+send or to abort.\n
I agree w. sipa, I like the create...inspect...commit paradigm better.\n
Im just not a huge fan of this as its an estimate and could very well be far off the estimate.  I agree with gavin and sipa here and had done it in one of the commits in #289\n
